channel.title: Depression
channel.description: Sup people, i'm fed up now, i've just quit my private server, why? Because i get millions of connections from 1 person, please somebody help me as much as you can, im so depressed as i've worked weeks with it, and its start to really **** me off, please someone help, i beg of you guys, you'll be saving my server, all the best, MikeScott

item.title: Depression
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

what i did was made an arraylist and had it check if the address was connected already and if it was then close connection
i added this to playerhandler

public static ArrayList<String> Addresses = new ArrayList<String>();

  public final static void AddAddress(String Address)
  {
    Addresses.add(Address.toLowerCase());
  }
public final static void RemoveAddress(String Address)
  {
    Addresses.remove(Address.toLowerCase());
  }
  public final static boolean ConnectAdd(String _Address)
  {
   _Address = _Address.toLowerCase();

   for(String Address : Addresses)
    if(Address.equals(_Address))
      return true;

   return false;
  }

and i replaced all the ips above misc.println(connectingHost+": Checking if server still is online...")
in the if statment with this

PlayerHandler.ConnectAdd(connectingHost)

and i added this to the accepting connections

playerHandler.AddAddress(connectingHost);

and then i added this to the logout method

PlayerHandler.RemoveAddress(connectedFrom);

it still has some problems if you lose connection but im working that out,i thought i’d show you how i done it

Read full topic

item.title: Depression
item.dc:creator: @itzkyle Lusfr
item.description:
@itzkyle wrote:

Add this to your run method.

        [code] for(int i = 0; i < server.playerHandler.players.length; i++){
         Player p = server.playerHandler.players[i]; if(p != null &&
         !p.disconnected && p.connectedFrom.equals(connectedFrom) &&
         playerId != p.playerId && !connectedFrom.equals("localhost")){
         itzscape("Address in use!"); returnCode = 9; disconnected =
         true; return; } }[/code]

in client.java

Read full topic

item.title: Depression
item.dc:creator: @mikescott mikescott
item.description:
@mikescott wrote:

No no, you don’t get it, its not a server crasher, i don’t know why it does it, it will just randomly take millions of connections from people until it crashes, nobody tries to crash it, even my really trusted friends have done it once, and even i have.
